title: so login failing and rip me and team
body: so i was in the middle of a ranked match i notice fps was skipping told my team i brb need to relog and my game froze so i went to force quit my mac on it back and i could not login cause t says i'm prob offline but i'm connected to my wifi perfectly well rip my teammates and my lp....... sigh

replies.body:
We're looking into these reports, and have a [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page up now about re-log issues.  We also have a workaround in a [pinned thread](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/Tb1fUZFV-known-issue-were-unable-to-log-you-in-because-you-may-be-offline), but since you are on a mac it might be different.  Let me know if these steps help:

1) Start and log onto League of Legends
2) Open Finder
3) Go to Applications
4) Right-click on League of Legends
5) Select Show Package Contents
6) Open Contents
7) Open LoL
8) Open Config
9) Locate LeagueClientSettings.yaml
10) Open it with a text editor and and find gameflow-patcher-lock
11)  Delete the whole line
12) Save file and restart the client

While wi-fi might cause lag issues sometimes, this one is on us.  I know this has been frustrating and it sucks that you lost LP as a result.  While I can't restore that, I hope those steps can help in the meantime.

I was in a game then it crashed. So i tried to reboot it real quick so i don't get AFK and it wouldnt let me until i re-downloaded  League of Legends and now i have to wait 20mins for 5 games. If you can help me ASAP. Thank you.{{champion:238}} {{summoner:4}} {{summoner:14}} {{item:3142}} {{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}

I was on a Mac and had the same issue. Had a hard time figuring out how to do this with the other posts instructions. You might consider adding this to the sticky!

Thanks for the fix.
Yaas!  I kind of hammed these instructions to troubleshoot.  I may just do that, thanks!
i wish i can make up to my team now.......
